companies.name: The Quran path
companies.description: The Quran Path is a comprehensive platform dedicated to helping individuals learn and master the recitation of the Quran with proper Tajweed. It offers step-by-step guidance, valuable resources, and expert support to ensure accurate pronunciation and understanding of the Quranic verses. Whether you are a beginner or looking to refine your skills, The Quran Path provides personalized lessons, practical exercises, and spiritual insights to help you connect deeply with the words of Allah. With a focus on simplicity and clarity, it is your trusted companion in achieving confidence, fluency, and a profound spiritual journey through the Quran.

companies.name: JobFinder.Ninja
companies.description: You've seen it before - you go to a freelance website and bid on a project.  It cost you some money, but that's okay, because you're confident that your skill and proposal will get you the bid.  A couple days later, your bid isn't chosen, because someone else who is far less qualified got the job just because they can undercut your price.  Thought:  What if you had to pay for every bid you placed?  That would reduce the amount of SPAM bidders who bid on every project.  But what about the cost to you?  You've ALSO seen websites where you do have to bid on projects.  Sure it makes for a quality control, but 10 bids later at a crazy amount of money per bid, you're broke and didn't get a single job.  Solution:  You have to pay for a bid, but if you don't win the job, you get your money back.  Doesn't that seem simple?  IT IS!  What we do:  You get charged a small monthly membership, at which point you are entitled to make a certain amount of bids as part of your membership.  If you don't win a project, you get refunded the bid cost.  If you win the project, you don't get your bid money back.  Do you have a job you want to post?  For the same monthly membership, you can post a certain amount of projects every month.    How do we make money on this:  Once the project poster selects a winning bidder (not always the highest or lowest, but the best proposal), we take a small percentage of the final agreed upon price.  Why does this work:  Your project is posted with the rest after being carefully looked over to make sure it meets standards and quality control.  Then our group of prospective freelancers, whom we have already qualified and verified as authentic job seekers, bid on your project.  Detailed proposals are given, and a price is set which they believe they can fulfill your project needs.   Everyone is qualified and verified before they are even added to the system, project posters and freelancers alike.

companies.name: Gilson Boards
companies.description: Gilson is an American snowboarding company that designs bases in three dimensions for an enhanced feel on the mountain.   The team is a close group of designers, craftsmen, and adventurers. They come from different backgrounds, but they share one thing - they love what they do.   They believe in the value of American artisan manufacturing, which is why they build their boards with locally grown trees here in central Pennsylvania.   They merge the woodworking heritage of their region with the precision of modern technology, building snowboards that are of the highest quality in construction.

companies.name: Economic Impact Rating
companies.description: A scientific and trusted Economic Impact Rating Certification Mark that takes a step beyond ''Made in the USA'' and ''Local'' product claims. The Economic Impact Rating offers a certification program and corresponding certification mark telling consumers how much a product contributes to economic growth in a specified area. The area of interest is shown directly on the mark and can range from city, state, regional to USA-wide designations.  The certification mark is published on a one- to five-star scale, also shown on the certification mark.

companies.name: Xpirient
companies.description: Xpirient exists to help with the  resources and maximize the life. They also help to make the life count, and squeezed every drop of potential out of this life.Xpirient members enjoy benefits in travel, wellness, shopping, dining, financial mentoring, relationship training, and health coaching.

companies.name: Astrall, Inc
companies.description: Astrall is an all-in-one marketplace for astrologers and their clients, empowered by a social component. It connects astrologers/vendors with consumers, providing them content, tools and advice.

companies.name: Egg Whites 24/7
companies.description: We supply the best 100% pure liquid egg whites, If you are looking to pack on some muscle or shred body fat, egg whites are the perfect protein supplement.

companies.name: Tuned In Tokyo
companies.description: Tuned in Tokyo was founded in 2015 by owners Brian Porter and Frankie Quiroz. After building a great social media following and presence on Instagram with our apparel designs. We have decided to take the next step and expand our horizon with the release of a premium clothing line. We are creating this new street wear apparel for our loyal fans, along with every car enthusiast around the world Now that the company has matured Frankie and Brian have been developing a new division within the company “Tuned in Tokyo Events”. These events allow any car enthusiast to see and experience their favorite car in person. In the end our goal here at Tuned In Tokyo is to bring the car community together regardless of the make and model.

companies.name: Work-Relay
companies.description: Work-Relay is a B2B SaaS provider that helps organizations digitize, manage, and optimize repeating work across complex business operations.

companies.name: Hipstitch Academy
companies.description: Hipstitch Academy specializes in creating unique, laser-engraved pieces that add a special touch to everyday life. The company operates a sewing studio where it offers classes and workshops, encouraging creativity and providing alternatives to fast fashion.
